name: Starfall (flowsoft games)
description:
You are a star fallen on the Earth. You find yourself in a dark forest looking for the way home. You are very weak. Catch all the glows to get your energy back and fly. But careful, avoid the black holes along the way trying to absorb you!

Starfall is an ongoing project, but the first level we offer you is complete and free. If you wish the story to continue, download and share! ;-)

Features:
- A complete level with increasing difficulty
- Three challenging elements: glows captured, fly time, game time
- With ads at game over
- Original soundtrack
- Handmade graphic

For informations/issues, email at: flowsoftgames@outlook.it
Follow us on Facebook for further news: https://www.facebook.com/flowsoftgames/
